RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Invalid username or password provided for MySQL
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Access denied for user 'spring'@'localhost' (using password: YES)
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Access denied for user (.*) \(using password: YES\)
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: You have prrovided and invalid username/password combination
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SolutionDetailHtml: Check that user $1 is allowed to connect with the provided password
